review: Best item I've bought on here

review: This thing sucks. I have 5 hours into it and it still doesn't work. I have 3 call into support and no one can seem to help.Nest I have to call the company who makes my router and have them configure it. I'm really not happy with this.
author: Soul Cat Guitars

review: Quit working. Get Apple TV, much better.
author: John B. McGill

review: After spending a year with an old laptop hooked up to my tv, this has simplified so much! The only reason iI have it four stars instead of five is because the iPhone app is a little buggy. I'm sure that will be fixed eventually.
author: Anthony

review: Needs more options, works OK. Nexus Player is probably closer to my needs.
author: Jeff Nicholas

review: Not much to say here, it's the Chromecast.  Can't go wrong if you want to turn your flat screen into a smart TV.
author: GeckoMan2000
